ValidationRule.description: #SAL-466 - The fields like Record Type, Owner and Name are only editable by Sales Ops
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT( $Setup.CMM_ObjectSaveMode__c.IsVRBypassed__c ), OR( AND( $Permission.CMM_HasSalesOpsPermission, ISCHANGED( Name ), RecordType.Name != 'Other' ),
AND( NOT( $Permission.CMM_HasSalesOpsPermission ), OR( ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ), ISCHANGED( Name ) ) ) ) )
